Desc.entry: Boxing club which also teaches life skills and nutrition. Has 3 ABA (Amateur Boxing Association) coaches, 2 female coaches and 3 first aiders. Also runs female only classes. Classes suitable for ages 5 years and over. All staff are Criminal Records Bureau (CRB) checked.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon-Fri 4.30-6.30pm, Sat & Sun (classes for children aged 5-11 years), please contact for further details
